snippet: Roger Federer rallied from two sets down to defeat Juan Martín del Potro, and Novak Djokovic saved four match points against Jo-Wilfried Tsonga to advance to the semifinals of the French Open.
abstract: Roger Federer defeats Juan Martin del Potro and Novak Djokovic defeats Jo-Wilfried Tsonga to advance to the French Open tennis tournament semifinals.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer rallied from two sets down to defeat Juan Martín del Potro, and Novak Djokovic saved four match points against Jo-Wilfried Tsonga to advance to the semifinals of the French Open.

headline.seo: 2012 French Open: Djokovic and Federer Survive to Set Up Semifinal Clash
headline.main: Djokovic and Federer Survive to Set Up French Open Semifinal Clash
headline.print_headline: Djokovic and Federer Survive to Set Up Semifinal Showdown
